entries.content:
Oh boy, Morty's mom, Beth Smith, is quite the character! She's a human and is alive, which is good, I guess. Depending on which dimension you're talking about, she has different origins. In the Replacement Dimension, she lives on Earth, and in the original Dimension C-137, she's also on Earth. 

Beth has appeared in a ton of episodes, starting from the very first one, "Pilot," all the way through to the latest seasons. She's got a complicated relationship with her father, Rick, and her husband, Jerry, which makes for some pretty intense family dynamics. 

You know, she’s also a bit of a badass, working as a veterinarian and dealing with all the crazy stuff that comes with being part of the Smith family. It's a wild ride, and honestly, I just try to keep up!
what else can you do for me?

Oh, hey there! Well, I can help you find information about episodes of "Rick and Morty," like summaries, air dates, and even details about specific characters. If you have any questions about the show, just let me know, and I'll do my best to help you out! Just like, uh, you know, how I try to help my family, even if it doesn't always go well.
